Text.val: 18.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY and
01.05.2009 GB SCR14611 Added DCMO_CURRENCY = GNRL_CURRENCY and changed
DCMO_MONTH = month of GNRL_NIGHTPROGRAMSDATE instead DCMO_MONTH = month of Date()
10.03.2009 GB SCR14471 Changed case of SQL option in DEBC
28.11.2008 SH SCR14085 additional parameter GM102 pi.batch_processing for 2 call of GM102
06.11.2008 AS SCR14085 additional parameter GM102 pi.batch_processing
07.11.2007 AK SCR13028 changes in some columns header name
set the language back to user language
replace ' ; ' with ',' in the e-mail address list

STP.TXT: M I S S I N G P A R A M E T E R pi.EMAILADDRESS I S M A N D A T O R Y
GNRD - G E N E R A L D I R E C T O R Y (ENTRY 85) I S E M P T Y

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select CLNT101_ADMNO, CLNT102_CLNTNO, CLNT108_ACC_CURR, CLNT503_CRDOMESTICAMOUNT, CLNT503_CRDOMESTICPERCENTAGE, CLNT503_CRDOMESTICTYPE, CLNT504_CRFOREIGNAMOUNT, CLNT504_CRFOREIGNPERCENTAGE, CLNT503_CRFOREIGNTYPE
from :1/clnt where CLNT101_ADMNO= :2 and exists ( select * from :1/ccry where CCRY308_ADMNO=CLNT101_ADMNO and CCRY308_CLNTNO=CLNT102_CLNTNO and CCRY501_DEBTORSRISK='Y')

select DEBC_DEBH, DEBC_DEBC, DEBC_ADMNO, DEBC_CLNTNO, DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY, DEBH_HADR_NAME1, DEBC_CREDITLIMIT, DEBB_ACTINVAC, ifnull(cast(( select sum(ifnull(DCMO_TOTASALESDEBTNOTES,0)-ifnull(DCMO_TOTASALESCREDNOTES,0)) from :1/dcmo where DCMO_DEBC_NO=DEBC_NO and DCMO_YEAR=:2 and DCMO_MONTH=:3 and DCMO_CURRENCY = ':4' ) as decimal(13,2)) ,0),
cast(( select sum(INVO_AACTUALC) from :1/invo where INVO_DEBC_NO=DEBC_NO and INVO_MARKCODESPEC=40 and INVO_AACTUALC<>0 ) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/debc join :1/debh on DEBC_DEBH = DEBH_NO join :1/debb on DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO join :1/ccry on CCRY308_ADMNO=DEBC_ADMNO and CCRY308_CLNTNO=DEBC_CLNTNO and CCRY308_COUNTRY=DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY and CCRY501_DEBTORSRISK='Y'
where (DEBB_ACTINVAC<>0 or DEBC_CREDITLIMIT<>0) and DEBC_ADMNO = :5 order by DEBC_DEBH
